TopicTitle: Mk2 Lightning Cockpit for B9 Aerospace v1.3 (FAR drag fixed)

Articles.Content:
Mk.2 Lightning

Cockpit for B9 Aerospace

Download

v1.3

- Fixed drag issue for FAR v0.14.3.x

v1.2

- Fixed FAR window issue

- Added DRE config

v1.1

- Fixed "hatch obstructed" issue

This is a two-man cockpit made to fit well with the Mk2 parts from B9 Aerospace.

Inspired by the F-35 and F-22, the module has built-in air intakes, a fully loaded IVA and a huge glass canopy.

You'll be able to clearly see all around you. Just hope it can withstand the vacuum of space.

Accessible through the MFDs are a forward, landing, bombing, and rear view camera.

Big thanks to bac9 for texturing tips (though I will never reach his level), and ferram4 for making a FAR config.

Requires B9 Aerospace and its dependencies, of course.
